title: Coming Soon: The Readback
description:
Introducing The Readback, a new podcast from Barron's. Every week, we invite you inside the Barron's newsroom-revealing the drama behind our stories, and exposing the forces that shape finance today.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Barron's
itunes:subtitle: Introducing The Readback, a new podcast from Barron's. Every week, we invite you inside the Barron's newsroom-revealing the drama behind our stories, and exposing the forces that shape finance today.
